body_html:
I think this is intended behavior, unfortunately. A typical resolution to this is to pick kernel_weights to have a nice name and use

`tf.histogram_summary(kernel_weights.name, kernel_weights)`
body_text:
I think this is intended behavior, unfortunately.  A typical resolution to this is to pick kernel_weights to have a nice name and use
`tf.histogram_summary(kernel_weights.name, kernel_weights)`
body:
I think this is intended behavior, unfortunately.  A typical resolution to this is to pick `kernel_weights` to have a nice name and use

```
`tf.histogram_summary(kernel_weights.name, kernel_weights)`
```
